summary: Congress is concerned that the Navy deliberately underfunded certain critical programs that use a special contracting method called multiyear procurement. For example, the Navy had multiyear contracts to purchase two destroyers per year in a 5-year period. For fiscal year 2022, it requested funding for only one destroyer and put the second one on its unfunded priorities list. The Navy was not required to explain...
title: Multiyear Procurement: Navy Should Provide Congress More Complete Information on Budget Request Decisions
